variant.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VARIANT_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VARIANT_HPP
00003

00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00010 #  pragma warning (disable : 4786) // too long name, harmless warning
00011 #endif

00028 
00029 #include <boost/mpl/front.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/mpl/pop_front.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/mpl/size.hpp>
00034 #include <boost/mpl/empty.hpp>
00035 
00036 #include <boost/serialization/throw_exception.hpp>
00037 
00038 #include <boost/variant.hpp>
00039 
00040 #include <boost/archive/archive_exception.hpp>
00041 
00042 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00043 #include <boost/serialization/serialization.hpp>
00044 
00045 namespace boost {
00046 namespace serialization {
00047 
00048 template<class Archive>
00049 struct variant_save_visitor : boost::static_visitor<> {
00050     variant_save_visitor(Archive& ar) :
00051         m_ar(ar)
00052     {}
00053     template<class T>
00054     void operator()(T const & value) const
00055     {
00056         m_ar << BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(value);
00057     }
00058 private:
00059     Archive & m_ar;
00060 };
00061 
00062 template<class Archive, BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(/* typename */ class T)>
00063 void save(
00064     Archive & ar,
00065     boost::variant<BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(T)> const & v,
00066     unsigned int /*version*/
00067 ){
00068     int which = v.which();
00069     ar << BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(which);
00070     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME  boost::variant<BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(T)>::types types;
00071     variant_save_visitor<Archive> visitor(ar);
00072     v.apply_visitor(visitor);
00073 }
00074 
00075 template<class S>
00076 struct variant_impl {
00077 
00078     struct load_null {
00079         template<class Archive, class V>
00080         static void invoke(
00081             Archive & /*ar*/,
00082             int /*which*/,
00083             V & /*v*/,
00084             const unsigned int /*version*/
00085         ){}
00086     };
00087 
00088     struct load_impl {
00089         template<class Archive, class V>
00090         static void invoke(
00091             Archive & ar,
00092             int which,
00093             V & v,
00094             const unsigned int version
00095         ){
00096             if(which == 0){
00097                 // note: A non-intrusive implementation (such as this one)
00098                 // necessary has to copy the value.  This wouldn't be necessary
00099                 // with an implementation that de-serialized to the address of the
00100                 // aligned storage included in the variant.
00101                 typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::front<S>::type head_type;
00102                 head_type value;
00103                 ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(value);
00104                 v = value;
00105                 ar.reset_object_address(& boost::get<head_type>(v), & value);
00106                 return;
00107             }
00108             typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::pop_front<S>::type type;
00109             variant_impl<type>::load(ar, which - 1, v, version);
00110         }
00111     };
00112 
00113     template<class Archive, class V>
00114     static void load(
00115         Archive & ar,
00116         int which,
00117         V & v,
00118         const unsigned int version
00119     ){
00120         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::eval_if<mpl::empty<S>,
00121             mpl::identity<load_null>,
00122             mpl::identity<load_impl>
00123         >::type typex;
00124         typex::invoke(ar, which, v, version);
00125     }
00126 
00127 };
00128 
00129 template<class Archive, BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(/* typename */ class T)>
00130 void load(
00131     Archive & ar, 
00132     boost::variant<BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(T)>& v,
00133     const unsigned int version
00134 ){
00135     int which;
00136     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::variant<BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(T)>::types types;
00137     ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(which);
00138     if(which >=  mpl::size<types>::value)
00139         // this might happen if a type was removed from the list of variant types
00140         boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00141             boost::archive::archive_exception(
00142                 boost::archive::archive_exception::unsupported_version
00143             )
00144         );
00145     variant_impl<types>::load(ar, which, v, version);
00146 }
00147 
00148 template<class Archive,BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(/* typename */ class T)>
00149 inline void serialize(
00150     Archive & ar,
00151     boost::variant<BOOST_VARIANT_ENUM_PARAMS(T)> & v,
00152     const unsigned int file_version
00153 ){
00154     split_free(ar,v,file_version);
00155 }
00156 
00157 } // namespace serialization
00158 } // namespace boost
00159 
00160 #endif //BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VARIANT_HPP
